General.Name: Boai NKY Pharmaceuticals Ltd
General.Description: Boai NKY Medical Holdings Ltd. engages in the fine chemical and medical care businesses in China and internationally. The company offers polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP) series products, and vinyl methyl ether and maleic acid products; anhydride copolymer (PVME/MA) series products; GBL, 2-pyrrolidone, NVP monomer, PVPK series (povidone), copovidone, and other VP/VA copolymer series products; and PVPP (cross-linked povidone), PVP-I, and related pharmaceutical intermediates. Its products are used in chemical, pharmaceutical, brewing and beverage, pigment and coating, textile, paper, oil extraction, photosensitive material, and electronic industries. The company was formerly known as Boai NKY Pharmaceuticals Ltd. and changed its name to Boai NKY Medical Holdings Ltd. in March 2016. Boai NKY Medical Holdings Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Jiaozuo, China.
